info.url_png_logo: http(s) url to pool logo; not animated; max 50kb

about.me: A 24/7 stake pool ran by two cardano enthusiasts. Feel free to ask us any questions on our social media!
about.server: Block producer is running on a Vultr VPS cloud instance. We are running 2 relay nodes on seperate locations for redundancy. We guarantee a 99.9% uptime with 200Mb/s internet.
